segments.text: Oh , do you really like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's kind of you to say so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In fact , could I ask you for the recipe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It's really very easy . First , mix together an egg , two teaspoons of salt , and two pounds of ground beef . Then , add two ounces of milk . Are you with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Next , put the mixture into a baking pan and bake it forty-five minutes at 360 degrees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute . I didn't catch you there . Could you repeat that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Bake it forty-five minutes at 360 degrees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , I've got it . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
